text: Xindao de renmen a! Nimen zai shoujie qijian, huo zai jindi jingnei, buyao zaisha suo huo de feiqin zoushou. Nimen zhong shui guyi zaisha, shui ying yi xiangdang de shengchu shuzui, na zhi shengchu, xu jing nimen zhong de liang ge gongzheng ren jiayi shending hou, song dao ke'er bai qu zuo gongwu, huo na fajin, ji shishe (ji ge) pinmin yi ri de kouliang; huo dai yi xiangdang de zhaijie, yibian ta changshi fanjie de eguo. Zhenzhu yi shu rao yiwang de zuiguo. Zaifan de ren, zhenzhu jiang chengfa ta. Zhenzhu shi wanneng de, shi cheng e de.
